value.message: Access control errors are not handled securely; missing explicit deny-by-default logic when permission data is missing or logic errors occur.
value.suggestion: Add error handling to ensure access is denied by default if permission checks fail or data is missing.

value.message: CRUD operations rely on client-supplied IDs without backend ownership verification, risking IDOR vulnerabilities.
value.suggestion: Implement backend resource ownership checks and use UUIDs or encrypted IDs instead of predictable sequential IDs.

value.message: URL redirects are not validated against an allow list, allowing potential open redirect vulnerabilities.
value.suggestion: Validate all redirect URLs against a predefined allow list before executing the redirect.
